title: storage, handling, manufacture or processing of radioactive substances or of highly combustible or e
clause_text: storage, handling, manufacture or processing of radioactive substances or of highly combustible or explosive materials or products which are liable to burn with extreme rapidity and/or producing poisonous fumes or explosive emanations;
